scripts.quickstart: pnpm infra:start && sleep 10 && pnpm db:setup && pnpm dev
scripts.check: npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules
scripts.infra:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.db:connect: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -c 'DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public;' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/01-schema.sql
scripts.db:seed:workspace: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/02-workspace-seed.sql
scripts.db:seed:agents: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/03-agents-seed.sql
scripts.db:setup: pnpm db:reset && pnpm db:seed && pnpm clickhouse:seed
scripts.db:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d boilerplate_db -c 'TRUNCATE TABLE agent_runs, tasks, agents, users, workspaces RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;'
scripts.clickhouse:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T clickhouse clickhouse-client --multiquery < packages/database/clickhouse-seed.sql
scripts.clickhouse:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS boilerplate_analytics; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS boilerplate_clickhouse; CREATE DATABASE boilerplate_clickhouse;" && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T clickhouse clickhouse-client --multiquery < packages/database/clickhouse-init.sql && pnpm clickhouse:seed
